questions.question_text: For which ITSI function is it a best practice to use a 15-30 minute time buffer?

There are two departments using ITSI. Finance and Sales. Analysts in each department should not be allowed to see each other’s services. What are the role configuration steps required to accomplish this?

choices.D: itoa_finance_admin, inherited from itoa_team_admin; itoa_sales_admin, inherited from itoa_team_admin; itoa_finance_analyst, inherited from itoa_analyst; itoa_sales_analyst, inherited from itoa_analyst.
choices.B: itoa_finance_admin, inherited from itoa_admin; itoa_sales_admin, inherited from itoa_team_admin; itoa_finance_analyst, inherited from itoa_team_analyst; itoa_sales_analyst, inherited from itoa_team_analyst.
choices.A: itoa_finance_admin, inherited from itoa_admin; itoa_sales_admin, inherited from itoa_team_admin; itoa_finance_analyst, inherited from itoa_analyst; itoa_sales_analyst, inherited from itoa_analyst.
choices.C: itoa_finance_admin, inherited from itoa_admin; itoa_sales_admin, inherited from itoa_team_admin; itoa_finance_analyst, inherited from itoa_analyst; itoa_sales_analyst, inherited from itoa_team_analyst.

choices.B: Select “No” for “Split by Entity” and “Yes” for “Filter to Entities in Service”.
choices.C: Select “Yes” for “Split by Entity” and “No” for “Filter to Entities in Service”.
choices.A: Select “Yes” for both “Split by Entity” and “Filter to Entities in Service”.
choices.D: Select “No” for both “Split by Entity” and “Filter to Entities in Service”.

questions.question_text: How do you automatically restrict a KPI to only the entities in its service, and generate KPI values for each entity?

choices.C: kvstore_to_json.py can be used in scripts or command line to backup ITSI for full or partial backups.
choices.D: ITSI backups are stored as a collection of JSON formatted files.
choices.B: ITSI backup is inclusive of KV Store, ITSI Configurations, and index dependencies.
choices.A: A pre-configured default ITSI backup job is provided that can be modified, but not deleted.

questions.question_text: Which of the following items describe ITSI Backup and Restore functionality? (Choose all that apply.)
Which of the following items apply to anomaly detection? (Choose all that apply.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
BC is correct
Friends could you please confirm this answer

choices.B: A minimum of 24 hours of data is needed for anomaly detection, and a minimum of 4 entities for cohesive analysis.
choices.D: There are 3 types of anomaly detection supported in ITSI: adhoc, trending, and cohesive.
choices.A: Use AD on KPIs that have an unestablished baseline of data points. This allows the ML pattern to perform it’s magic.
choices.C: Anomaly detection automatically generates notable events when KPI data diverges from the pattern.
